ygData.subject: Re: On alliance again
ygData.msgSnippet: It s pretty much worthless.  If you use it for an item that costs 100+pp you *might* save a copper or two. Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server) Servant of
ygData.messageBody:
It's pretty much worthless. If you use it for an item that costs 100+pp you
*might* save a copper or two.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath


> -----Original Message-----
> From: XIII [mailto:dlepriol@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 8:59 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] On alliance again
>
>
> From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
>
> Ok,
>
> Out of boredom I tried use of illus human+alliance spell on a
> human vendor.
> End result : the price remain the same. So maybe this spell is used
> differently but I think it has been discussed here before. Any opinion?.
>
> Ibnabeth/Karada
